name: Keen Uneek Sandals - Men's
description:
A lightweight sandal/sneaker hybrid that conforms to your foot. The construction gives you an airy feel and  freedom of movement without sacrificing protection for your toes.Uppers are comfortable, free-moving cords that adjust to your foot for a custom fit.Fully enclosed heel with soft, quick-dry lining.Cleansport NXT natural odour control keeps your feet smelling fresh.Midsoles are EVA designed to give arch support and cradle your foot.Outsoles are non-marking rubber with high-traction pods.This style runs a little small, so consider ordering 1/2 size larger than your usual size.

        Sustainability
